author: jkoudys
content: Good morning eth people - I'm the CTO of a legal tech company. Lots of lawyers on board with their stodgy, real-paper actual (non-smart) contracts. Just saw a couple unicorns that already feel a generation or two behind pitched as "cloud-based legal services", so I'm feeling like eth2 could be groundbreaking for a team with contract lawyers and experienced legal tech devs already onboard.

author: trent_vanepps
content: are you saying you are looking forward to eth2?

author: trent_vanepps
content: my followup is that you don't need to wait for it, Ethereum today is ready for you to build on!

author: jkoudys
content: oh I know, but The Merge is going to be a big deal for adoption. That's why I want to get this stuff built now

author: jkoudys
content: probably won't be able to make any money off of it until after the merge

author: mikehale_
content: Hey Y'all... I've been doing software/web development for 20+ years and I'm very excited to dive in and learn more about building dApps!

author: Deleted User
content: Hello, i am new here, try find channell where can ask about mining, is there any official news when it will stop?

author: trent_vanepps
content: no official date, because it's kind of impossible in an ecosystem like Ethereum, but the latest estimates are by end of year or Q1 2022. I would be very cautious getting into mining now if you are considering it
